meanings.definition: to melt or cause to melt excessively
meanings.sent1: The sun overmelts the ice cream on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to overmelts the chocolate when heating it.
meanings.sent3: The candle overmelts into a colorful puddle on the table.
meanings.sent4: Her heart overmelts with joy when she sees her puppy.
meanings.sent5: The heat from the fire overmelts the snow, creating a small stream.

meanings.sent1: The overmelts of the ice cream caused a sticky mess.
meanings.sent2: The overmelts of the candle dripped onto the floor.
meanings.sent3: The overmelts of the chocolate formed interesting shapes.
meanings.sent4: The overmelts of the glacier flowed rapidly down the mountain.
meanings.sent5: The overmelts of the wax created a colorful sculpture on the table.

meanings.definition: excessively melted or melted beyond the desired point
meanings.sent1: The overmelts chocolate was too runny to use for dipping.
meanings.sent2: The overmelts cheese on the pizza made it soggy.
meanings.sent3: The overmelts ice cream was too soft to scoop.
meanings.sent4: The overmelts butter in the pan gave the pancakes a crispy edge.
meanings.sent5: The overmelts snow on the roof slid down in a big avalanche.
